TextView.android:text: How To Play Tic Tac Toe, For Dummies.
Objective: \nBeat the other player by forcing a win without them see your plan all along.

Rules: 
 1) A player adds a symbol 'x' or 'o' in turns into only empty squares, player 1 uses 'x' and player 2 'o'. 
 2) If a player gets three of their symbol in a row/column/diagonal, it is considered a win. 
 3) Players play until all squares are filled, if no one get three adjacent symbols, the game ends in a tie.
